name: Abduction
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When this Aura enters, untap enchanted creature.
You control enchanted creature.
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: Abyssal Hunter
oracle_text: {B}, {T}: Tap target creature. This creature deals damage equal to its power to that creature.
flavor_text: Some smiles show cheer; some merely show teeth.

name: Abyssal Specter
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever this creature deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

name: Adarkar Wastes
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}. This land deals 1 damage to you.

name: Aether Flash
oracle_text: Whenever a creature enters, this enchantment deals 2 damage to it.
flavor_text:
"You can't get there from here. Well, you can—it just won't be fun."
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Agonizing Memories
oracle_text: Look at target player's hand and choose two cards from it. Put them on top of that player's library in any order.
flavor_text:
"An innocent man died because of my anger. That knowledge will haunt me for all eternity."
—Karn, silver golem

name: Air Elemental
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: As insubstantial, and as powerful, as the wind that carries it.

name: Aladdin's Ring
oracle_text: {8}, {T}: This artifact deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
". . . The magician drew a ring off his finger . . . , saying: 'It is a talisman against all evil, so long as you obey me.'"
—*The Arabian Nights*,
Junior Classics trans.

name: Amber Prison
oracle_text:
You may choose not to untap this artifact during your untap step.
{4}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land. That permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as this artifact remains tapped.

name: Anaba Bodyguard
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"Not all minotaurs are tribal. Some are freelance."
—Eron the Relentless

name: Anaba Shaman
oracle_text: {R}, {T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"The shamans? Ha! They are craven cows not capable of true magic."
—Irini Sengir

name: Ancestral Memories
oracle_text: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

name: Animate Wall
oracle_text:
Enchant Wall
Enchanted Wall can attack as though it didn't have defender.
flavor_text:
"When you have been bitten with fangs of granite, you start to long for the ivory sabers of tigers."
—Norin the Wary

name: Ankh of Mishra
oracle_text: Whenever a land enters, this artifact deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
flavor_text: Tawnos finally cracked the puzzle: the strange structures did not house Mishra's malevolent creations but were themselves among his creations.

name: Archangel
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
flavor_text:
"My mother once told me angels sing their swords' names with each strike."
—Sisay, Captain of the *Weatherlight*

name: Ardent Militia
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: Some fight for honor and some for gold, but the militia fight for hearth and home.

name: Armageddon
oracle_text: Destroy all lands.

name: Armored Pegasus
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Asked how it survived a run-in with a bog imp, the pegasus just shook its mane and burped.

name: Ashen Powder
oracle_text: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text:
"What you call decay, I call ripening. You'll gain no sustenance from this harvest."
—Kaervek

name: Ashnod's Altar
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Add {C}{C}.
flavor_text: The Brothers' War scarred the land, but Ashnod left her mark in the bloodlines of those she tortured.

name: Balduvian Barbarians
flavor_text:
"Barbarian raids were a concern to those living in the northwest provinces, but the skyknights never dealt with the problem in a systematic way. They thought of the Balduvians as an 'amusing model' of their forebears' culture."
—*Kjeldor: Ice Civilization*

name: Balduvian Horde
oracle_text: When this creature enters, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

name: Birds of Paradise
oracle_text:
Flying
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Blaze
oracle_text: Blaze deals X damage to any target.
flavor_text: Fire never dies alone.

name: Blight
oracle_text:
Enchant land
When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it.

name: Blighted Shaman
oracle_text:
{T}, Sacrifice a Swamp: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Blood Pet
oracle_text: Sacrifice this creature: Add {B}.
flavor_text: "You are wrong," Volrath said. "I do not hate the living. They often prove quite useful to me." And then he laughed.

name: Bog Imp
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Don't be fooled by their looks. Think of them as little knives with wings.

name: Bog Rats
oracle_text: This creature can't be blocked by Walls.
flavor_text: Their stench was vile and strong enough, but not nearly as powerful as their hunger.

name: Bog Wraith
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: It moved through the troops leaving no footprints, save on their souls.

name: Boil
oracle_text: Destroy all Islands.
flavor_text:
"The fishers will throw out their nets and draw them back filled with dust."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Boomerang
oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: A lie always returns; be careful how you catch it.

name: Bottle of Suleiman
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, create a 5/5 colorless Djinn artifact creature token with flying. If you lose the flip, this artifact deals 5 damage to you.

name: Browse
oracle_text: {2}{U}{U}: Look at the top five cards of your library, put one of them into your hand, and exile the rest.
flavor_text:
"Once great literature—now great litter."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

name: Brushland
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}. This land deals 1 damage to you.

name: Burrowing
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has mountainwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

name: Call of the Wild
oracle_text: {2}{G}{G}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
flavor_text: Thinking of dinner made Squee realize that the forest was probably thinking the same thing.

name: Castle
oracle_text: Untapped creatures you control get +0/+2.
flavor_text:
"Hang out our banners on the outward walls; / The cry is still, 'They come'; our castle's strength / Will laugh a siege to scorn."
—William Shakespeare, *Macbeth*

name: Cat Warriors
oracle_text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: These stealthy felines have survived so many battles that some believe they must possess many lives.

name: Celestial Dawn
oracle_text:
Lands you control are Plains.
Nonland permanents you control are white. The same is true for spells you control and nonland cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.
You may spend white mana as though it were mana of any color. You may spend other mana only as though it were colorless mana.

name: Charcoal Diamond
oracle_text:
This artifact enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.

name: Chill
oracle_text: Red spells cost {2} more to cast.
flavor_text:
"Temper, temper."
—Ertai, wizard adept

oracle_text: {1}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

oracle_text: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

oracle_text:
Whenever this land becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to you.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Coercion

A rhino's bargain
—Femeref expression meaning "a situation with no choices"

name: Conquer
oracle_text:
Enchant land
You control enchanted land.
flavor_text:
"Why do we trade with those despicable elves? You don't live in forests, you burn them!"
—Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

name: Counterspell
oracle_text: Counter target spell.

name: Creeping Mold
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.
flavor_text:
"Mold could catch you."
—Suq'Ata insult

name: Crimson Hellkite
oracle_text:
Flying
{X}, {T}: This creature deals X damage to target creature. Spend only red mana on X.
flavor_text:
"Dragonfire forged me a warrior."
—Rashida Scalebane

name: Crusade
oracle_text: White creatures get +1/+1.

name: Crystal Rod
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

name: Crystal Vein
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice this land: Add {C}{C}.

name: Cursed Totem
oracle_text: Activated abilities of creatures can't be activated.
flavor_text:
Pass me from soul to soul, / soldier to herder, herder to beast, beast to soil / until I am everywhere. / Then pass me those souls.
—Totem inscription (translated)

name: Dancing Scimitar
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Bobbing merrily from opponent to opponent, the scimitar began adding playful little flourishes to its strokes; it even turned a couple of somersaults.

name: Daraja Griffin
oracle_text:
Flying
Sacrifice this creature: Destroy target black creature.
flavor_text:
"And the flamingos said, 'Get out of our nest—we can't be seen with the likes of you!' So, the griffin ate them."
—Azeworai, "The Ugly Bird"

name: Daring Apprentice
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Counter target spell.
flavor_text: In front of every great wizard is a doomed apprentice.

name: D'Avenant Archer
oracle_text: {T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: Avenant's archers are also trained as poets, so that each arrow is guided by a fragment of verse.

name: Deflection
oracle_text: Change the target of target spell with a single target.
flavor_text:
Up and down,
over and through,
back around—
the joke's on you.

name: Dense Foliage
oracle_text: Creatures can't be the targets of spells.
flavor_text:
"Big plants not only good for hidin', but full o' tasty bugs, too."
—Squee, goblin cabin hand

name: Derelor
oracle_text: Black spells you cast cost {B} more to cast.
flavor_text:
"Strength it has, but at the cost of a continuous supply of energy. Such failure can bear only one result."
—Execution order of Endrek Sahr, master breeder

name: Desertion
oracle_text: Counter target spell. If an artifact or creature spell is countered this way, put that card onto the battlefield under your control instead of into its owner's graveyard.
flavor_text: First the insult, then the injury.

name: Diminishing Returns
oracle_text: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library. You exile the top ten cards of your library. Then each player draws up to seven cards.

name: Dingus Egg
oracle_text: Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, this artifact deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

name: Disrupting Scepter
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate only during your turn.

name: Divine Transformation
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
flavor_text: Glory surged through her and radiance surrounded her. All things were possible with the blessing of the Divine.

name: Doomsday
oracle_text: Search your library and graveyard for five cards and exile the rest. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order. You lose half your life, rounded up.

name: Dragon Engine
oracle_text: {2}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"How is it the legged engines seem so much more alive than their wheeled counterparts? Simply, they were born, not made."
—Mishra

name: Dragon Mask
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)
flavor_text:
"With no further options, I was forced to don the mask."
—Rashida Scalebane

name: Dread of Night
oracle_text: White creatures get -1/-1.
flavor_text:
"These moonless, foreign skies keep me in thrall. Dark whispers echo in the night, and I cannot resist."
—Selenia, dark angel

name: Dream Cache
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand both on top of your library or both on the bottom of your library.
flavor_text:
Dreams' riches are easily spent.
—Suq'Ata adage

name: Drudge Skeletons
oracle_text: {B}: Regenerate this creature. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)
flavor_text:
"The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, they never surrender, and they don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off."
—Nevinyrral, *Necromancer's Handbook*

name: Dry Spell
oracle_text: Dry Spell deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor_text:
"Wherever water is lacking, all things suffer."
—Autumn Willow

name: Dwarven Ruins
oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
{T}, Sacrifice this land: Add {R}{R}.

name: Early Harvest
oracle_text: Target player untaps all basic lands they control.
flavor_text:
"Tonight we'll eat a farewell feast. Cold corn porridge is not enough. / Let's peel papayas, pineapples, and mangoes, drink coconut milk, / and bake bananas."
—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Earthquake
oracle_text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

name: Ebon Stronghold
oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
{T}, Sacrifice this land: Add {B}{B}.

name: Ekundu Griffin
oracle_text: Flying, first strike
flavor_text:
"My goat was a small price to pay for the chance to see the hunting griffin dive and seize it."
—Suq'Ata trader

name: Elder Druid
oracle_text: {3}{G}, {T}: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
flavor_text:
"Did clouds dance in his eyes,
did thorns play at his fingertips?"
—Shesul Fass, faerie bard

name: Elven Cache
oracle_text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Elves know where to harvest the best of the forest, for they planted it there themselves.

name: Elven Riders
oracle_text: This creature can't be blocked except by Walls and/or creatures with flying.
flavor_text:
Sometimes it is better to be swift of foot than strong of swordarm.
—Elven proverb

name: Elvish Archers
oracle_text: First strike
flavor_text: "I tell you, there was so many arrows flying about you couldn't hardly see the sun. So I says to young Angus, 'Well, at least now we're fighting in the shade!'"

name: Enfeeblement
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
flavor_text:
"If it is weak, either kill it or ignore it. Anything else honors it."
—Kaervek

name: Enlightened Tutor
oracle_text: Search your library for an artifact or enchantment card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
flavor_text:
"I do not teach. I simply reveal."
—Daudi, Femeref tutor

name: Ethereal Champion
oracle_text: Pay 1 life: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to this creature this turn.
flavor_text:
"If I have learned anything as a wizard it is this: never fight your own battles."
—Waffa, sorcerer of Nyomba

name: Evil Eye of Orms-by-Gore
oracle_text:
Non-Eye creatures you control can't attack.
This creature can't be blocked except by Walls.
flavor_text: The highway of fear is the shortest route to defeat.

name: Exile
oracle_text: Exile target nonwhite attacking creature. You gain life equal to its toughness.

name: Fallen Angel
oracle_text:
Flying
Sacrifice a creature: This creature gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Angels are simply extensions of truth upon the fabric of life—and there is far more dark than light."
—Baron Sengir

name: Fallow Earth
oracle_text: Put target land on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text:
". . . and when the farmer awoke the next morning, all the seeds from his field were once again in their sacks."
—Afari, *Tales*

name: Familiar Ground
oracle_text: Each creature you control can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor_text:
"I'd rather fight on foreign soil. That way, if I lose I can blame it on the terrain."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Fatal Blow
oracle_text: Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"What is crueler? To let a wound of the heart fester, or to simply cut it out?"
—Crovax

name: Fear
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

name: Feast of the Unicorn
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +4/+0.
flavor_text:
"Could there be a fouler act? No doubt the baron knows of one."
—Autumn Willow

name: Femeref Archers
oracle_text: {T}: This creature deals 4 damage to target attacking creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"They say a Zhalfirin archer can split the eye of a griffin. Nonsense, of course; they have no faith to guide their darts."
—Nuru, Femeref archer

name: Feral Shadow
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Not all shadows are cast by light—some are cast by darkness.

name: Fervor
oracle_text: Creatures you control have haste. (They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)
flavor_text:
"If your blood doesn't run hot, I will make it run in the sands!"
—Maraxus of Keld

name: Final Fortune
oracle_text: Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.
flavor_text:
Want all, lose all.
—Zhalfirin aphorism

name: Firebreathing
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Magic's only part of it, my friend. Diet does the rest."
—Suq'Ata trader

name: Fire Diamond
oracle_text:
This artifact enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.

name: Fire Elemental
flavor_text: Fire elementals are ruthless infernos, annihilating and consuming their foes in a frenzied holocaust. Crackling and blazing, they sear swift, terrible paths, leaving the land charred and scorched in their wake.

name: Fit of Rage
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Anger is fleeting; remorse is eternal."
—Karn, silver golem

name: Flame Spirit
oracle_text: {R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The spirit of the flame is the spirit of change."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

name: Flash
oracle_text: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, sacrifice it unless you pay its mana cost reduced by {2}.

name: Flashfires
oracle_text: Destroy all Plains.

name: Flight
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.

name: Flying Carpet
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

name: Fog
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

name: Fog Elemental
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When this creature attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at end of combat.
flavor_text:
"I've seen fog so thick you could cut it, but none that could cut me."
—Tahngarth of the *Weatherlight*

name: Forbidden Crypt
oracle_text:
If you would draw a card, return a card from your graveyard to your hand instead. If you can't, you lose the game.
If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere, exile that card instead.

name: Forget
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards, then draws as many cards as they discarded this way.

name: Fountain of Youth
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: You gain 1 life.
flavor_text: The fountain had stood in the town square for centuries, but only the pigeons knew its secret.

name: Fyndhorn Brownie
oracle_text: {2}{G}, {T}: Untap target creature.
flavor_text:
"I've been insulted by drunks in a hundred inns, but never as skillfully or annoyingly as by those blasted brownies."
—General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

name: Fyndhorn Elder
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}{G}.
flavor_text:
"Do we know what we're doing? Yes—the will of Freyalise."
—Laina of the Elvish Council

name: Gaseous Form
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Giant Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: It's not far into the trap, as the crow flies.

name: Giant Strength
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
flavor_text:
"O! it is excellent / To have a giant's strength, but it is tyrannous / To use it like a giant."
—William Shakespeare,
*Measure for Measure*

name: Glacial Wall
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
flavor_text:
"Huge walls of ice block further travel. We can't believe they are natural."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Glasses of Urza
oracle_text: {T}: Look at target player's hand.

name: Goblin Digging Team
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Destroy target Wall.
flavor_text:
"From down here we can make the whole wall collapse!"
"Uh, yeah, boss, but how do we get out?"

name: Goblin Elite Infantry
oracle_text: Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: They talk a good fight.

name: Goblin Hero
flavor_text:
"When you're a goblin, you don't have to step forward to be a hero—everyone else just has to step back!"
—Biggum Flodrot, goblin veteran

name: Goblin King
oracle_text: Other Goblins get +1/+1 and have mountainwalk.
flavor_text: To be king, Numsgil did in Blog, who did in Unkful, who did in Viddle, who did in Loll, who did in Alrok . . . .

name: Goblin Recruiter
oracle_text: When this creature enters, search your library for any number of Goblin cards, reveal them, then shuffle and put those cards on top in any order.
flavor_text: "Next!"

name: Goblin Warrens
oracle_text: {2}{R}, Sacrifice two Goblins: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor_text:
"Goblins bred underground, their numbers hidden from the enemy until it was too late."
—*Sarpadian Empires*, vol. IV

name: Gorilla Chieftain
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Regenerate this creature.
flavor_text:
"In the soil of leadership sprout the seeds of immortality."
—Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper

name: Gravebane Zombie
oracle_text: If this creature would die, put it on top of its owner's library instead.

name: Gravedigger
oracle_text: When this creature enters, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.

name: Greed
oracle_text: {B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"There is no calamity greater than lavish desires. There is no greater guilt than discontentment. And there is no greater disaster than greed."
—Lao Tsu, *Tao Te Ching*, (trans. Chan)

name: Grinning Totem
oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Search target opponent's library for a card and exile it. Then that player shuffles. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card. At the beginning of your next upkeep, if you haven't played it, put it into its owner's graveyard.

name: Grizzly Bears
flavor_text: Don't try to outrun one of Dominaria's grizzlies; it'll catch you, knock you down, and eat you. Of course, you could run up a tree. In that case you'll get a nice view before it knocks the tree down and eats you.

name: Hammer of Bogardan
oracle_text:
Hammer of Bogardan deals 3 damage to any target.
{2}{R}{R}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only during your upkeep.

name: Harmattan Efreet
oracle_text:
Flying
{1}{U}{U}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"One moment I was walking along the beach, and the next I was high in the air, staring into a hideous smiling face."
—Tarub, Suq'Ata sailor

This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.

name: Hero's Resolve

Enchant creature

flavor_text:
"Destiny, chance, fate, fortune—they're all just ways of claiming your successes without claiming your failures."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Hidden Horror
oracle_text: When this creature enters, sacrifice it unless you discard a creature card.

name: Horned Turtle
flavor_text:
"So like men are they: a hardened shell with fragile flesh beneath."
—Selenia, dark angel

name: Howl from Beyond
oracle_text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

name: Howling Mine
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if this artifact is untapped, that player draws an additional card.

name: Hulking Cyclops
oracle_text: This creature can't block.
flavor_text: Anyone can get around a cyclops, but few can stand in its way.

name: Hurricane
oracle_text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

name: Icatian Town
oracle_text: Create four 1/1 white Citizen creature tokens.
flavor_text: Icatia's once-peaceful towns faced increasing attacks from orcs and goblins as the climate cooled. By the time the empire fell, they were little more than armed camps.

name: Illicit Auction
oracle_text: Each player may bid life for control of target creature. You start the bidding with a bid of 0. In turn order, each player may top the high bid. The bidding ends if the high bid stands. The high bidder loses life equal to the high bid and gains control of the creature. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

name: Infantry Veteran
oracle_text: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The true dishonor for a soldier is surviving the war."
—Telim'Tor

name: Infernal Contract
oracle_text: Draw four cards. You lose half your life, rounded up.
flavor_text:
"But I signed nothing!"
—Taraneh, Suq'Ata mage

name: Inferno
oracle_text: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor_text:
"Some have said there is no subtlety to destruction. You know what? They're dead."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

name: Insight
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts a green spell, you draw a card.
flavor_text:
"We can fight with you or against you. After my day, I'd prefer the former."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Inspiration
oracle_text: Target player draws two cards.
flavor_text:
"Madness and genius are separated only by degrees of success."
—Sidar Jabari

name: Iron Star
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

name: Ivory Cup
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

name: Jade Monolith
oracle_text: {1}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, that source deals that damage to you instead.

name: Jalum Tome
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: This timeworn relic was responsible for many of Urza's victories, though he never fully comprehended its mystic runes.

name: Jayemdae Tome
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: Draw a card.

name: Jokulhaups
oracle_text: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"The raging waters had swept away trees, bridges, and even houses. My healers had much work to do."
—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest

name: Juxtapose
oracle_text: You and target player exchange control of the creature you each control with the greatest mana value. Then exchange control of artifacts the same way. If two or more permanents a player controls are tied for greatest, their controller chooses one of them.

name: Karplusan Forest
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}. This land deals 1 damage to you.

name: Kismet
oracle_text: Artifacts, creatures, and lands your opponents control enter tapped.
flavor_text:
"Make people wait for what they want, and you have power over them. This is as true for merchants and militia as it is for cooks and couples."
—Gwendlyn Di Corci

name: Kjeldoran Dead
oracle_text:
When this creature enters, sacrifice a creature.
{B}: Regenerate this creature.
flavor_text:
"They shall drink sorrow's dregs. They shall kill those whom once they loved."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Kjeldoran Royal Guard
oracle_text: {T}: All combat damage that would be dealt to you by unblocked creatures this turn is dealt to this creature instead.
flavor_text:
Honorable in battle, generous in death.
—Motto of the Kjeldoran Royal Guard

name: Lead Golem
oracle_text: Whenever this creature attacks, it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text: Slow and heavy swings the club.

name: Leshrac's Rite
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has swampwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text:
"Bind me to thee, my soul to thine. I am your servant and your slave. Blood for blood, flesh for flesh, Leshrac, my lord."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Library of Lat-Nam
oracle_text:
An opponent chooses one —
• You draw three cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
• You search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Lightning Blast
oracle_text: Lightning Blast deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"Those who fear the darkness have never seen what the light can do."
—Selenia, dark angel

name: Light of Day
oracle_text: Black creatures can't attack or block.
flavor_text:
"I do not miss sunlight. The very memory of it burns my eyes."
—Volrath

name: Living Lands
oracle_text: All Forests are 1/1 creatures that are still lands.

name: Llanowar Elves
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text:
One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot.
—Llanowar penalty for trespassing

name: Longbow Archer
oracle_text: First strike; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
"If it bears wings, I will pin it to the skies over Tefemburu."
—Roya, Zhalfirin archer

name: Lord of Atlantis
oracle_text: Other Merfolk get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor_text: A master of tactics, the lord of Atlantis makes his people bold in battle merely by arriving to lead them.

name: Lost Soul
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: Her hand gently beckons, she whispers your name—but those who go with her are never the same.

name: Lure
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.
flavor_text: When setting a snare, success depends not on the quality of the trap, but the quality of the bait.

name: Manabarbs
oracle_text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, this enchantment deals 1 damage to that player.

name: Mana Prism
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Mana Short
oracle_text: Tap all lands target player controls and that player loses all unspent mana.

name: Marble Diamond
oracle_text:
This artifact enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.

name: Maro
oracle_text: Maro's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.
flavor_text: No two see the same Maro.

name: Meekstone
oracle_text: Creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
flavor_text: When the mighty sleep, the lowly prowl.

name: Memory Lapse
oracle_text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Um . . . oh . . . what was I saying?"
—Reveka, wizard savant

name: Merfolk of the Pearl Trident
flavor_text: Are merfolk humans with fins, or are humans merfolk with feet?

name: Mesa Falcon
oracle_text:
Flying
{1}{W}: This creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The faith of Serra is borne on wings of hope."
—Gulsen, abbey matron

name: Millstone
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Target player mills two cards.
flavor_text: More than one mage has been driven insane by the sound of the millstone relentlessly grinding away.

name: Mind Warp
oracle_text: Look at target player's hand and choose X cards from it. That player discards those cards.
flavor_text: The hardest of wizards can have the softest of minds.

name: Mischievous Poltergeist
oracle_text:
Flying
Pay 1 life: Regenerate this creature.
flavor_text:
"The past is a ghost that haunts you from the moment it exists until the moment you don't."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Moss Diamond
oracle_text:
This artifact enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.

name: Mountain Goat
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text: Only the heroic and the mad follow mountain goat trails.

name: Mystical Tutor
oracle_text: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
flavor_text:
"To the tutors, a 'poem of sand' was of little account, a 'poem of ivory,' priceless."
—Afari, *Tales*

name: Mystic Compass
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

name: Nature's Resurgence
oracle_text: Each player draws a card for each creature card in their graveyard.
flavor_text:
Spring follows winter
—Elvish expression meaning "all things pass"

name: Necrosavant
oracle_text: {3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only during your upkeep.

name: Nightmare
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.
flavor_text: As the poisoned land spreads, so does the nightmare's rage and terrifying strength.

name: Obsianus Golem
flavor_text:
"The foot stone is connected to the ankle stone, the ankle stone is connected to the leg stone . . . ."
—"Song of the Artificer"

name: Orcish Artillery
oracle_text: {T}: This creature deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to you.
flavor_text: In a rare display of ingenuity, the orcs invented an incredibly destructive weapon. Most orcish artillerists are those who dared criticize its effectiveness.

name: Orcish Oriflamme
oracle_text: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.

name: Order of the Sacred Torch
oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Counter target black spell.
flavor_text: A blazing light to drive out the shadows.

name: Ornithopter
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"It has been my honor to improve on the Thran's original design. Perhaps history will remember me in some small part for my work."
—Urza, in his apprenticeship

name: Pacifism
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

name: Painful Memories
oracle_text: Look at target opponent's hand and choose a card from it. Put that card on top of that player's library.
flavor_text:
"It is terrible how one brief action can live forever in memory."
—Jolrael

name: Panther Warriors
flavor_text: The dogs of war are nothing compared to the cats.

name: Patagia Golem
oracle_text: {3}: This creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: It scattered falcons like a lion hunting among jackals.

name: Pearl Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
{1}{W}: This creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"They knew Bantau was lost when, to hide the pearl he had found on the beach, he swallowed it—and soon grew wings."
—Hakim, Loreweaver

name: Pentagram of the Ages
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
flavor_text: A mirror, a shield, a promise, a great distance, and a kind word—five ways to avoid harm.

name: Perish
oracle_text: Destroy all green creatures. They can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"There will come a time when the voices of soil and seedling will sing only laments."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Pestilence
oracle_text:
At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice this enchantment.
{B}: This enchantment deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

name: Phantasmal Terrain
oracle_text:
Enchant land
As this Aura enters, choose a basic land type.
Enchanted land is the chosen type.

name: Phantom Warrior
oracle_text: This creature can't be blocked.
flavor_text: The phantom warrior comes from nowhere and returns there just as quickly.

name: Phyrexian Vault
oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"The secrets of Phyrexia are expensive. You will pay in brass and bone, steel and sinew."
—Kaervek

name: Pillage
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.

name: Polymorph
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card. The player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles all other cards revealed this way into their library.
flavor_text: "Ahh! Opposable digits!"

name: Power Sink
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that player doesn't, they tap all lands with mana abilities they control and lose all unspent mana.

name: Pradesh Gypsies
oracle_text: {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"A mysterious people indeed. Their origins are as secret as their traditions."
—Lord Magnus of Llanowar

name: Primal Clay
oracle_text: As this creature enters, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 artifact creature, a 2/2 artifact creature with flying, or a 1/6 Wall artifact creature with defender in addition to its other types. (A creature with defender can't attack.)

name: Prodigal Sorcerer
oracle_text: {T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Occasionally members of the Institute of Arcane Study acquire a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.

name: Prosperity
oracle_text: Each player draws X cards.
flavor_text:
"Wealth is a good thing, compared to poverty—your food is better, your robes are softer, and your companions have bathed more recently."
—Kukemssa pirate

name: Psychic Transfer
oracle_text: If the difference between your life total and target player's life total is 5 or less, exchange life totals with that player.
flavor_text:
"The memory of your existence will fade like the final stars of morning."
—Kaervek

name: Psychic Venom
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, this Aura deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

name: Pyrotechnics
oracle_text: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.
flavor_text:
"Hi!ni!ya! Behold the man of flint, that's me! / Four lightnings zigzag from me, strike and return."
—Navajo war chant

name: Python
flavor_text:
"How can you claim the gods are merciless when they robbed the snake of its limbs to give the other creatures a sporting chance?"
—Hakim, Loreweaver

name: Radjan Spirit
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn.

name: Raging Goblin
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

name: Rag Man
oracle_text: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Target opponent reveals their hand and discards a creature card at random. Activate only during your turn.
flavor_text: "Aw, he's just a silly, dirty little man. What's to be afraid of?"

name: Raise Dead
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.

name: Rampant Growth
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Rath forces plants from its surface as one presses whey from cheese.

name: Razortooth Rats
oracle_text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor_text:
"Men and rats both hunger: we for our playthings; they, for us."
—Crovax

name: Recall
oracle_text: Discard X cards, then return a card from your graveyard to your hand for each card discarded this way. Exile Recall.

name: Reckless Embermage
oracle_text: {1}{R}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to itself.
flavor_text: Many mages have been consumed by their work.

name: Redwood Treefolk
flavor_text: The soldiers chopped and chopped, and still the great tree stood, frowning down at them.

name: Regal Unicorn
flavor_text: Unicorns don't care if you believe in them any more than you care if they believe in you.

name: Regeneration
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters attached to that creature.)
{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)

name: Relearn
oracle_text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"Barrin taught me that the hardest lessons to grasp are the ones you've already learned."
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Relentless Assault
oracle_text: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.
flavor_text:
"Flog and Squee / Up the tree / See the army / Flee, flee, flee."
—Goblin nursery rhyme/war cry

name: Remedy
oracle_text: Prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of targets, divided as you choose.
flavor_text:
"These things will protect you while I'm gone, remind you of my love for you."
—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Remove Soul
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell.
flavor_text: Nethya stiffened suddenly, head cocked as if straining to hear some distant sound, then fell lifeless to the ground.

name: Reprisal
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"The meek shall fight as one, and they shall overcome even the greatest of foes."
—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest

name: Resistance Fighter
oracle_text: Sacrifice this creature: Prevent all combat damage target creature would deal this turn.
flavor_text:
"My soldiers fought without hesitation, died without doubt."
—Sidar Jabari

name: Reverse Damage
oracle_text: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

name: River Boa
oracle_text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
{G}: Regenerate this creature.
flavor_text:
"But no one heard the snake's gentle hiss for peace over the elephant's trumpeting of war."
—Afari, *Tales*

name: Rod of Ruin
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: This artifact deals 1 damage to any target.

name: Rowen
oracle_text: Reveal the first card you draw each turn. Whenever you reveal a basic land card this way, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"I've dreamt of a second harvest but fear I will not see it."
—Asmira, holy avenger

name: Ruins of Trokair
oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
{T}, Sacrifice this land: Add {W}{W}.

name: Sabretooth Tiger
oracle_text: First strike
flavor_text:
"I fear anything with teeth measured in handspans!"
—Norin the Wary

name: Sage Owl
oracle_text:
Flying
When this creature enters, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
flavor_text: The owl asks but never answers.

name: Samite Healer
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: Healers ultimately acquire the divine gifts of spiritual and physical wholeness. The most devout are also granted the ability to pass physical wholeness on to others.

name: Scaled Wurm
flavor_text:
"Flourishing during the Ice Age, these wurms were the bane of all Kjeldorans. Their great size and ferocity made them the subject of countless nightmares—they embodied the worst of the Ice Age."
—*Kjeldor: Ice Civilization*

name: Scathe Zombies
flavor_text:
"They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose,
Nor spake, nor moved their eyes;
It had been strange, even in a dream,
To have seen those dead men rise."
—Samuel Coleridge,
"The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

name: Sea Monster
oracle_text: This creature can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
flavor_text: Water is life. Or perhaps it is just something to wash it down with.

name: Segovian Leviathan
oracle_text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor_text:
"Leviathan, too! Can you catch him with a fish-hook or run a line round his tongue?"
—*The Bible*, Job 41:1

name: Sengir Autocrat
oracle_text:
When this creature enters, create three 0/1 black Serf creature tokens.
When this creature leaves the battlefield, exile all Serf tokens.

name: Serenity
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy all artifacts and enchantments. They can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"Just think of me as the storm before the calm."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Serra's Blessing
oracle_text: Creatures you control have vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)
flavor_text:
"I have seen your strength imbued in angels' wings, and I have felt your sorrow rain down on the ruins brought by the Lord of the Wastes."
—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

name: Shanodin Dryads
oracle_text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: Moving without sound, swift figures pass through branches and undergrowth completely unhindered. One with the trees around them, the dryads of Shanodin Forest are seen only when they wish to be.

name: Shatter
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact.

name: Shatterstorm
oracle_text: Destroy all artifacts. They can't be regenerated.
flavor_text: Chains of leaping fire and sizzling lightning laid waste the artificers' handiwork, sparing not a single device.

name: Shock
oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
Lightning tethers souls to the world.
—Kor saying

name: Sibilant Spirit
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever this creature attacks, defending player may draw a card.
flavor_text: She had expected death to roar, to thunder, to growl. She did not recognize it when it came hissing to her side.

name: Skull Catapult
oracle_text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: This artifact deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"What manner of fiend would design such a sadistic device?"
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic

name: Sky Diamond
oracle_text:
This artifact enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.

name: Snake Basket
oracle_text: {X}, Sacrifice this artifact: Create X 1/1 green Snake creature tokens. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text:
"Uh, does anyone have a flute?"
—Rana, Suq'Ata market fool

name: Soldevi Sage
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice two lands: Draw three cards, then discard one of them.
flavor_text:
"To hide the truth is more than folly—it is fatal."
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic

name: Soul Net
oracle_text: Whenever a creature dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

name: Spell Blast
oracle_text: Counter target spell with mana value X. (For example, if that spell's mana cost is {3}{U}{U}, X is 5.)
flavor_text: Call it the thinking mage's version of brute force.

name: Spirit Link
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters attached to that creature.)
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

name: Spitting Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: It prefers its meals cooked.

name: Spitting Earth
oracle_text: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
flavor_text:
"There are times solid ground gives precious little comfort."
—Talibah, embermage

name: Stalking Tiger
oracle_text: This creature can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor_text: In the Jamuraan jungles, there is often no separating beauty from danger.

name: Standing Troops
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: The less you have, the harder you fight for it.

name: Staunch Defenders
oracle_text: When this creature enters, you gain 4 life.
flavor_text:
"Hold your position! Leave doubt for the dying!"
—Tahngarth of the *Weatherlight*

name: Stone Rain
oracle_text: Destroy target land.

name: Storm Cauldron
oracle_text:
Each player may play an additional land during each of their turns.
Whenever a land is tapped for mana, return it to its owner's hand.

name: Storm Crow
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Storm crow descending, winter unending. Storm crow departing, summer is starting.

name: Strands of Night
oracle_text: {B}{B}, Pay 2 life, Sacrifice a Swamp: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"I have seen the night torn into thin darkling strips and woven into shapes too bleak for dreams."
—Crovax

name: Stream of Life
oracle_text: Target player gains X life.

name: Stromgald Cabal
oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Counter target white spell.
flavor_text: When the alliance between Balduvia and Kjeldor deprived Stromgald of easy victories, its agents were forced to fuel their rituals with their own flesh.

name: Stupor
oracle_text: Target opponent discards a card at random, then discards a card.
flavor_text:
There are medicines for all afflictions but idleness.
—Suq'Ata saying

name: Sulfurous Springs
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}. This land deals 1 damage to you.

name: Summer Bloom
oracle_text: You may play up to three additional lands this turn.
flavor_text: Summer sends its kiss with warmth and blooming life.

name: Sunweb
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
This creature can't block creatures with power 2 or less.
flavor_text:
"There is no sweeter music than the wails of a dying dragon."
—Rashida Scalebane

name: Svyelunite Temple
oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
{T}, Sacrifice this land: Add {U}{U}.

name: Syphon Soul
oracle_text: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

name: Talruum Minotaur
oracle_text: Haste
flavor_text:
Don't insult a Talruum unless your mount is swift.
—Suq'Ata saying

name: Tariff
oracle_text: Each player sacrifices the creature they control with the greatest mana value unless they pay that creature's mana cost. If two or more creatures a player controls are tied for greatest, that player chooses one.

name: Teferi's Puzzle Box
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player puts the cards in their hand on the bottom of their library in any order, then draws that many cards.

name: Terror
oracle_text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

name: The Hive
oracle_text: {5}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Insect artifact creature token with flying named Wasp. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Mouths and wings beyond numbering, but a single mind to guide them.

name: Thicket Basilisk
oracle_text: Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
flavor_text: Moss-covered statues littered the area, a macabre monument to the basilisk's terrible power.

name: Throne of Bone
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

name: Tidal Surge
oracle_text: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.
flavor_text:
"It is nature that gives us our boundaries and nature that enforces them."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Trained Armodon
flavor_text: These are its last days. Better to grow broad and heavy. Better that the enemy is crushed beneath its carcass.

name: Tranquil Grove
oracle_text: {1}{G}{G}: Destroy all other enchantments.

name: Tranquility
oracle_text: Destroy all enchantments.

name: Tremor
oracle_text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor_text:
"Where do you run when the earth becomes your enemy?"
—Naimag, Femeref philosopher

name: Tundra Wolves
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text: I heard their eerie howling, the wolves calling their kindred across the frozen plains.

name: Uktabi Orangutan
oracle_text: When this creature enters, destroy target artifact.
flavor_text:
"Is it true that the apes wear furs of gold when they marry?"
—Rana, Suq'Ata market fool

name: Uktabi Wildcats
oracle_text:
Uktabi Wildcats's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control.
{G}, Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate this creature.

name: Underground River
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}. This land deals 1 damage to you.

name: Unseen Walker
oracle_text:
Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
{1}{G}{G}: Target creature gains forestwalk until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"To pass through the jungle: silence, courtesy, ferocity, as the occasion demands."
—Kamau, "Proper Passage"

name: Unsummon
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

name: Untamed Wilds
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

name: Unyaro Griffin
oracle_text:
Flying
Sacrifice this creature: Counter target red instant or sorcery spell.
flavor_text: The griffin's shadow gives courage to the righteous and dread to the idle.

name: Vampiric Tutor
oracle_text: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. You lose 2 life.
flavor_text:
"I write upon clean white parchment with a sharp quill and the blood of my students, divining their secrets."
—Shauku, Endbringer

name: Venerable Monk
oracle_text: When this creature enters, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: His presence brings not only a strong arm but also renewed hope.

name: Verduran Enchantress
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: Some say magic was first practiced by women, who have always felt strong ties to the land.

name: Vertigo
oracle_text: Vertigo deals 2 damage to target creature with flying. That creature loses flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I saw the wizard gesturing, but I didn't guess his plan until my aesthir cried out and went into a dive."
—Arna Kennerüd, skyknight

name: Viashino Warrior
flavor_text:
"When traveling the Great Desert avoid wearing the scales of lizards, for the Viashino rule the sands and look poorly on the skinning of their cousins."
—*Zhalfirin Guide to the Desert*

name: Vitalize
oracle_text: Untap all creatures you control.
flavor_text:
"After waking to the magic of Llanowar, no dreams can compare."
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

name: Vodalian Soldiers
flavor_text:
"Vodalian rank is displayed by the colors and patterns of their skin. Beware the color red; that is the badge of the empress's favor."
—Corbio, pearl diver

name: Volcanic Dragon
oracle_text: Flying, haste
flavor_text: Speed and fire are always a deadly combination.

name: Volcanic Geyser
oracle_text: Volcanic Geyser deals X damage to any target.
flavor_text:
My thunder comes before the lightning; my lightning comes before the clouds; my rain dries all the land it touches. What am I?
—Femeref riddle

name: Waiting in the Weeds
oracle_text: Each player creates a 1/1 green Cat creature token for each untapped Forest they control.
flavor_text: The trees have ears, eyes, and teeth.

name: Wall of Air
oracle_text: Defender, flying (This creature can't attack, and it can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
When no falcons fly, beware the sky.
—Femeref aphorism

name: Wall of Fire
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Struggle, and you will only fan the flames."
—Talibah, embermage

name: Wall of Swords
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
flavor_text: Sharper than wind, lighter than air.

name: Wand of Denial
oracle_text: {T}: Look at the top card of target player's library. If it's a nonland card, you may pay 2 life. If you do, put it into that player's graveyard.
flavor_text: You'll never miss what you never had.

name: Warmth
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts a red spell, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"Flame grows gentle with but a little distance."
—Orim, Samite healer

name: Warrior's Honor
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Warthog
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text:
"Too much work—it takes a long time to break them in, and more than a few recruits."
—Grebog, goblin swine-rider

name: Wild Growth
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.

name: Wind Drake
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"No bird soars too high, if he soars with his own wings."
—William Blake, *The Marriage of Heaven and Hell*

name: Wind Spirit
oracle_text:
Flying
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text:
" . . . When the trees bow down their heads, The wind is passing by."
—Christina Rossetti,
"Who Has Seen the Wind?"

name: Wooden Sphere
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

name: Worldly Tutor
oracle_text: Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, then shuffle and put the card on top.
flavor_text:
"Aselbo soon had the rhino eating from his palm and the snake waiting at his heels."
—Afari, *Tales*

name: Wrath of God
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

name: Wyluli Wolf
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"When one wolf calls, others follow. Who wants to fight creatures that eat scorpions?"
—Maimun al-Wyluli, diary

name: Zombie Master
oracle_text:
Other Zombie creatures have swampwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
Other Zombies have "{B}: Regenerate this permanent."
flavor_text: He controlled the zombies even before his own death; now nothing can make them betray him.

name: Zur's Weirding
oracle_text:
Players play with their hands revealed.
If a player would draw a card, they reveal it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws a card.
